short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hunt the Virus - Chrome extension game!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is just a fun Chrome Extension game. 

When you start the game a virus (don't worry, not a real one! - just an icon) will be placed in one of your tabs, you just need to find it and click on it, and we'll let you know how long it took.
